title: Analysis: Fallout of ‘Mega Merger’ Would Rattle Across Entire WorldTour
content:
Implications of a Jumbo-Visma/Soudal Quick-Step fusion would play across the entire elite men's peloton, and could leave dozens of riders and support staff in a lurch.

Read the full article at Analysis: Fallout of ‘Mega Merger’ Would Rattle Across Entire WorldTour on Velo.
author: ahood
